author: Chan Sek Keong CJ:
casename: Jeffery bin Abdullah v Public Prosecutor
counsel: S K Kumar (S K Kumar & Associates) for the appellant; Mark Tay (Attorney-General's Chambers) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Sentencing/Principles/One transaction rule/Totality principle/Proportionality principle/Where offender convicted of various offences arising out of one incident overall sentence should reflect role and culpability in incident as a whole
